body:
Comment 3 by **cornelius.howl**: 
https://github.com/c9s/coffeephp/blob/master/src/coffeephp/parser.go#L276    # shows the
correct token name.

but the $$TokenName() function is expected to show the correct token name when I pass
token id to it:
https://github.com/c9s/coffeephp/blob/master/src/coffeephp/parser.go#L257
